Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute at 119th/Perry
ShortDescription: 119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via 119th, Wentworth, 115th, State and 119th: due to, street blockage near 119th/Perry.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 119th, Wentworth, 115th, State and 119th: due to, street blockage near 119th/Perry.

Allow extra travel time.
